body_html:
With some guidance and if it makes sense I can do it. The first attempt doing the obvious addition of

#ifdef TH_REAL_IS_HALF
#define NUMPY_TYPE_ENUM NPY_HALF
#endif

in torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp gives compile errors

[...]/torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp:34:13: error: no match for ‘operator=’ (operand types are ‘THHalf {aka __THHalf}’ and ‘double’)
     data[i] = arrdata[i];                                 \
             ^

and similar for other types.

body:
With some guidance and if it makes sense I can do it. The first attempt doing the obvious addition of 
```C
#ifdef TH_REAL_IS_HALF
#define NUMPY_TYPE_ENUM NPY_HALF
#endif
```
in `torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp` gives compile errors
```
[...]/torch/csrc/generic/Tensor.cpp:34:13: error: no match for ‘operator=’ (operand types are ‘THHalf {aka __THHalf}’ and ‘double’)
     data[i] = arrdata[i];                                 \
             ^
```
and similar for other types.
